title: Crocus Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Take-out, British, English
description: Volunteer led, fair trade, vegetarian community cafe. Offers in-house-made main meals with at least one vegan choice. Has soup, salads, panini, snacks, cakes, and always at least one vegan cake. Hosts a Thursday dinner where booking is advised. Previously named Crocus Cafe and Bakery.
